main_definition: Armstrong is primarily recognized as a surname, but it can also be used to describe strong physical or mental characteristics.

meanings_and_examples.example: Neil Armstrong was an American astronaut who became the first person to walk on the moon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Strength or power in physical abilities
meanings_and_examples.example: With his strong arm, he could easily lift heavy weights at the gym.
Her ability to solve complex problems quickly and efficiently showed her great intellectual Armstrong.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Strength of character, such as resilience or determination
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite facing many challenges in life, his strong willpower helped him overcome adversity.
